content.query:
DROP TABLE Policyfacttable;
DROP TABLE Salesfacttable


CREATE TABLE Policyfacttable (
    [month] INT,
    [year] INT,
    Number_of_customers INT,
    sold_cars_policies INT,
    inventory_car_policies INT,
    liable_cars INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([month])
);

CREATE TABLE Salesfacttable (
    [year] INT,
    [month] INT,
    Avg_Selling_Price FLOAT,
    No_Of_Cars_Sold INT,
    No_Of_Individual_Sales INT,
    No_Of_Dealer_Sales INT,
    inventory_count INT,
    no_insurance_count INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([year])
);
